item.title: 高盛将 2025 年下半年布伦特原油预测值上调至 66 美元
item.description: 高盛（Goldman Sachs）周一上调了 2025 年下半年的油价预测，理由是供应中断风险、经济合作与发展组织国家石油库存减少以及俄罗斯的产量限制。【原文：Goldman Sachs raised its oil price forecasts for the second half of 2025 on Monday, citing the risk of supply disruption, lower oil inventories in Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development countries and Russia's production constraints.】

item.title: 总部设在中国的和赛就美国将公司与中国军方挂钩的裁决提出上诉
item.description: 中国激光雷达制造商合赛集团周一对一项裁决提出上诉，该裁决维持了美国政府将其列入涉嫌与中国军方合作的公司名单的决定。【原文：China-based lidar manufacturer Hesai Group appealed a ruling on Monday upholding a U.S. government decision to add it to a list of companies allegedly working with Beijing's military.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利、高盛和富国银行达成与 Archegos 倒闭有关的和解协议
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）、高盛（Goldman Sachs）和富国银行（Wells Fargo）将支付总计 1.2 亿美元的赔偿金，以了结一项诉讼，该诉讼称他们在销售 ViacomCBS 股票时隐瞒了利益冲突，助长了 Bill Hwang 的 Archegos Capital Management 公司的倒闭。【原文：Morgan Stanley , Goldman Sachs and Wells Fargo will pay a total of $120 million to settle a lawsuit claiming they hid conflicts of interest while sales of ViacomCBS shares helped fuel the collapse of Bill Hwang's Archegos Capital Management.】

item.title: 美国稀土定价体系有望挑战中国的主导地位
item.description: 美国努力打破中国在稀土市场的主导地位，并推动对本国稀土产业的投资，在华盛顿的支持下，美国计划建立一个独立的、更高的定价体系。【原文：U.S. efforts to break China's dominance of the rare earths market and to drive investment in its own industry have moved up a gear with a Washington-backed plan to create a separate, higher pricing system.】

item.title: 到 2028 年，许多美国冰淇淋生产商将逐步淘汰人工食品染料
item.description: 国际乳制品食品协会（International Dairy Foods Association）周一表示，数十家美国冰淇淋生产商计划在 2028 年之前从其产品中去除人工色素。【原文：Dozens of U.S. ice cream producers are planning to remove artificial colors from their products by 2028, the International Dairy Foods Association said on Monday.】

item.title: IDC 认为尽管关税和宏观经济存在不确定性，全球智能手机市场仍将增长
item.description: 研究公司IDC的初步数据显示，尽管存在关税问题和宏观经济的不确定性，第二季度全球智能手机出货量仍增长了1%，达到2.952亿部。【原文：Global smartphone shipments increased 1% to 295.2 million units in the second quarter, despite tariff concerns and macroeconomic uncertainty, according to preliminary data from research firm IDC.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，特朗普将公布 700 亿美元的人工智能和能源投资计划
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周一援引一位政府官员的话报道，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普将于周二宣布在宾夕法尼亚州投资 700 亿美元用于人工智能和能源领域。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump will announce $70 billion in artificial intelligence and energy investments in Pennsylvania on Tuesday, Bloomberg News reported on Monday, citing an administration official.】

item.title: 旧金山联储称，特朗普关税将提升美国工厂就业岗位，但削减整体收入
item.description: 旧金山联储周一的最新研究显示，特朗普政府的关税措施可能会促进美国大多数州的制造业就业和实际收入，但会降低全国的就业率和经通胀调整后的收入。【原文：The Trump administration's tariffs are likely to boost U.S. manufacturing jobs and real income in a majority of states, but lower employment and income adjusted for inflation in the country as a whole, new research from the San Francisco Federal Reserve showed on Monday.】

item.title: 美国最繁忙港口称中国降低关税后 6 月进口反弹
item.description: 美国最繁忙的海港洛杉矶港执行董事周一表示，6 月份该港的进口量强劲反弹，与去年同期相比增长了 10%，并使该月的总进口量创下历史新高。【原文：Imports to the busiest U.S. seaport in Los Angeles rebounded strongly in June, finishing up 10% versus a year ago and contributing to record total volume for the month, the port's executive director said on Monday.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，关税威胁使欧洲央行七月决策复杂化，但不会破坏降息暂停计划
item.description: 五位欧洲央行决策者告诉路透社，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁对欧盟进口商品征收30%的关税，这使欧洲央行的决策变得更加复杂，但不太可能破坏下周暂停降息的计划。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's threatened 30% tariff on European Union imports is complicating the European Central Bank's decision-making but is unlikely to derail plans for a pause in rate cuts next week, five ECB policymakers told Reuters.】

item.title: 美国国防部授予谷歌和 xAI 合同
item.description: 美国国防部首席数字与人工智能办公室（Chief Digital and Artificial Intelligence Office）周一表示，OpenAI、Alphabet 旗下谷歌公司 Anthropic 和埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的人工智能公司 xAI 赢得了旨在扩大美国国防部采用先进人工智能能力的合同。【原文：OpenAI, Alphabet's Google , Anthropic and Elon Musk's AI firm xAI have won contracts aimed at scaling up adoption of advanced AI capabilities in the U.S. Department of Defense, the Chief Digital and Artificial Intelligence Office said on Monday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，OraSure Technologies 收到业内企业家的收购要约
item.description: 三位熟悉此事的人士称，著名医疗企业家罗恩-茨旺齐格（Ron Zwanziger）向医疗设备制造商 OraSure Technologies 提出收购要约，这标志着高度分散的诊断行业将出现更多整合。【原文：Prominent healthcare entrepreneur Ron Zwanziger approached medical device maker OraSure Technologies with a takeover offer, three people familiar with the matter said, in what would mark more consolidation in the heavily fragmented diagnostic industry.】

item.title: 以色列 Bezeq 公司将以 1.6 亿美元收购当地电信公司
item.description: Bezeq 以色列电信公司周一表示，它已签署了一项非约束性协议，将以 1.6 亿美元收购 Exelera 电信公司。【原文：Bezeq Israel Telecom said on Monday it had signed a non-binding deal to buy Exelera Telecom for $160 million.】

item.title: 扎克伯格称 Meta 将为超级智能投资数千亿美元
item.description: 马克-扎克伯格（Mark Zuckerberg）周一表示，Meta Platforms 公司将斥资数千亿美元购买计算能力来构建超级智能，这加剧了他对这项技术的追求，他一直在通过人才争夺战来争夺顶尖的人工智能工程师。【原文：Mark Zuckerberg said on Monday that Meta Platforms would spend hundreds of billions of dollars on computing power to build superintelligence, intensifying his pursuit of a technology he has chased with a talent war for top AI engineers.】

item.title: 比特币反弹更多是受机构需求而非投机驱动
item.description: 随着比特币在周一创下历史新高，来自机构资金流和衍生品的证据表明，比特币的涨势可能比之前的投机性上涨更加稳定和持久。【原文：As bitcoin hit a record high on Monday, evidence from institutional flows and derivatives suggested its rally might be more stable and lasting than previous speculative runs.】

item.title: 沃尔沃汽车因推迟上市和关税而计提 10 亿美元减值费用
item.description: 总部位于瑞典的沃尔沃汽车公司周一表示，将在第二季度一次性计提 114 亿瑞典克朗（约合 11.9 亿美元）的非现金减值费用。【原文：Sweden-based Volvo Cars will book a one-off, non-cash impairment charge of 11.4 billion Swedish crowns ($1.19 billion) in the second quarter, it said on Monday.】

item.title: 通用汽车将在田纳西州工厂生产低成本电池芯
item.description: 通用汽车公司正计划在田纳西州与韩国 LG Energy Solution 公司的合资工厂生产成本更低的电池芯。【原文：General Motors is planning to produce lower-cost battery cells at its joint-venture plant with South Korea's LG Energy Solution in Tennessee.】

item.title: 报道称，美国退出外交，中国挺身而出
item.description: 美国参议院外交关系委员会的民主党人在周一发布的一份报告中称，随着唐纳德-特朗普总统的政府削减美国的国际存在，中国正在扩大其外交影响力。【原文：China is increasing its diplomatic reach as President Donald Trump's administration pares back America's international presence, Democrats from the U.S. Senate Foreign Relations Committee said in a report released on Monday.】

item.title: 美联储鲍威尔要求监察长审查被特朗普官员批评的项目
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）已要求美国中央银行的监察长审查其位于华盛顿的历史性总部的翻新费用，因为特朗普政府官员正加紧批评美联储的管理方式。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell has asked the U.S. central bank's inspector general to review the costs involved in the renovation of its historic headquarters in Washington, as Trump administration officials intensify their criticism of how the Fed is being run.】

item.title: 欧盟五国将测试年龄验证应用程序以保护儿童
item.description: 在全球日益关注社交媒体对儿童心理健康的影响之际，欧盟委员会周一表示，法国、西班牙、意大利、丹麦和希腊将测试一个年龄验证应用程序的蓝图，以保护儿童上网。【原文：France, Spain, Italy, Denmark and Greece will test a blueprint for an age verification app to protect children online, the European Commission said on Monday, amid growing global concern about the impact of social media on children's mental health.】

item.title: Moonvalley 融资 8,400 万美元加强人工智能视频工具
item.description: 人工智能研究公司月谷公司（Moonvalley）在发布首个视频人工智能模型一周后，于本周一表示在由现有投资者General Catalyst领投的一轮融资中又筹集了8400万美元。【原文：Artificial intelligence research company Moonvalley has raised $84 million more in a funding round led by existing investor General Catalyst, it said on Monday, a week after releasing its first video AI model.】

item.title: 美联储主席哈马克认为没有迫切需要降息的理由 - Fox Business
item.description: 克利夫兰联邦储备银行行长贝丝-哈马克（Beth Hammack）周一表示，在贸易关税将如何影响价格压力的不确定性持续存在的情况下，鉴于通胀率仍然过高，她认为目前没有降低利率的迫切需要。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Cleveland President Beth Hammack said on Monday she sees no imminent need to lower interest rates right now given that inflation is still too high, amid ongoing uncertainty about how trade tariffs will affect price pressures.】

item.title: Zimmer将以1.77亿美元收购Monogram技术公司，扩大机器人产品组合
item.description: 两家公司周一表示，Zimmer Biomet 将以约 1.77 亿美元的价格收购机器人公司 Monogram Technologies，将 Monogram 的半自主和全自主手术产品纳入其不断扩大的机器人产品组合。【原文：Zimmer Biomet it will acquire robotics firm Monogram Technologies for about $177 million, adding Monogram’s semi- and fully autonomous surgical products to its expanding robotics portfolio, the companies said on Monday】

item.title: 建筑软件开发商 Nemetschek 发现 29 亿美元收购潜力
item.description: 德国建筑与施工软件开发商 Nemetschek 首席执行官 Yves Padrines 周一告诉路透社，该公司有可能进一步进行收购，金额高达 25 亿欧元（约合 29.2 亿美元）。【原文：The German architecture and construction software developer Nemetschek sees potential for further acquisitions of up to 2.5 billion euros ($2.92 billion), its Chief Executive Officer Yves Padrines told Reuters on Monday.】

item.title: 专注于加密货币的灰度公司秘密申请在美国上市
item.description: 专注于加密货币的资产管理公司 Grayscale 周一表示，该公司已向美国证券交易委员会秘密提交了文件，这表明随着比特币屡创新高，该公司可能计划在美国上市。【原文：Crypto-focused asset manager Grayscale said on Monday it has confidentially submitted paperwork with the Securities and Exchange Commission, signaling potential plans for a U.S. listing as bitcoin scales new highs.】

item.title: 继 Haldiram 交易之后，淡马锡关注更多印度家族企业
item.description: 新加坡国家投资者淡马锡正在寻求对印度家族企业进行更多投资，该公司的一位高层管理人员周一表示，在此之前的几个月，淡马锡已向一家广受欢迎的国内零食公司投资了 10 亿美元。【原文：Singapore's state investor Temasek is looking to invest more in Indian family-run businesses, a top executive said on Monday, months after it invested $1 billion in a popular domestic snacks company.】

item.title: 欧特克专注于战略，可能不会与 PTC 达成交易
item.description: 软件设计制造商欧特克（Autodesk）在周一提交的一份监管文件中表示，该公司计划继续推进其 "战略重点"，只进行 "有针对性的收购"。【原文：Software design maker Autodesk said in a regulatory filing on Monday that it plans to pursue its "strategic priorities" and make only "targeted and tuck-in acquisitions," suggesting there will be no deal with software firm PTC .】

item.title: 印度塔塔科技公司因赢得交易，季度收入降幅低于预期
item.description: 印度塔塔技术公司（Tata Technologies）周一公布的第一季度收入降幅小于预期，原因是在充满挑战的宏观经济环境下，该公司赢得了大量交易并执行了合同。【原文：India's Tata Technologies reported a smaller-than-expected revenue decline for the first quarter on Monday, as strong deal wins and execution of contracts helped it in a challenging macroeconomic environment.】

item.title: 印度 HCLTech 公司第一季度收入超出预期，但预期有所收窄
item.description: 印度第三大软件服务供应商 HCLTech 周一公布的季度收入好于预期，主要得益于欧洲和 "世界其他地区 "的增长。【原文：HCLTech , India's third-largest software services provider, reported better-than-expected quarterly revenue on Monday, aided by growth in Europe and "rest of world" geographies.】

item.title: 俄罗斯法院将美资食品公司的资产移交给国家
item.description: 据塔斯社周五晚些时候报道，莫斯科一家法院裁定，美资罐头食品公司 Glavprodukt 的资产应移交给俄罗斯国家，从而结束了长达数月的法律纠纷。【原文：A Moscow court has ruled that the assets of U.S.-owned canned food company Glavprodukt be handed over to the Russian state, the TASS news agency reported late on Friday, ending a months-long legal tussle over the company.】
